txt.en: As the strange spirits fade back into the waters, a scout approaches
Approach the scout to return to camp
Approach the scout to return to camp.
Something is lurking among the ruins along the banks of the Greyflood, and you have been asked to investigate.
Investigate along the banks of the Greyflood
Investigate the apparitions along the bank of the Greyflood.
You have discovered the spirits haunting the Greyflood
